section.p: You have been washed up in a small harbour. Many fishing boats painted in gay colours lie on the tide-streaked mud. A pretty town of white-washed cottages stretches steeply up from the quayside towards high cliffs.
You climb the harbour steps and explore the streets. You soon discover that the place is under a curse, as all the villagers stand frozen like statues.

choices.choice: Rest in one of the houses
